channel.title: Today I learned on Dinis Peixoto

item.title: Do Not Track - HTTP header
item.description: While I was setting up Google Analytics for this website, something that should be straightforward as Hugo already provides an internal template for this, I’ve noticed that my requests were not being tracked and displayed in the Google Analytics dashboard. I started by making sure that the internal template was actually being properly used and then, just in case, that the tracking id was correct. Both seemed to be ok.
